title: Courses and Trainings
description: Comprehensive studies of Buddhist scriptures pave the foundation for the prolongation of the Buddha Sāsana (dispensation).

title: Meditation
description: Meditation is a part of daily life of anyone who is seeking spiritual fulfilment. Are you looking for guidance for your mediation? IIT is willing to render a helping hand in your noble quest.
